column5: Since I was researching this topic and came across this great article I thought I'd share it with ya'll. Here's the link http://www.utoronto.ca/ski/water/faq/btdrivetrain.html . Happy reading.
Thanks for the link kennyman, good read. The information is geared toward waterskiing - substitute "skier" with "muskie bait" and it makes for even more interesting reading!! -Brian
Muskie bait eh??? Is that like a waterskiing hampster???
